column4: Hi! I am installing a wireless driver. I need to know the "linux kernel source include path". What is it?
Hi! I am installing a wireless driver. I need to know the "linux kernel source include path". What is it?
Thanks! I have a problem with this, though. My card requires that I downgrade the kernel to 2.6.24---but linux--header--generic would not downgrade! How do I resolve this?
